title: Bug 7752 - Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails.
description: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the 'Export' dialog window. 2. Select both projects that were created earlier. 3. Give the zip file a name (such as 'test.zip') and click 'Export to zip file'.
OB: When attempting to export multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, an error message box pops up indicating that problems were encountered during the export. The details of the error message specify the file with the same name in 'project2' (e.g., 'foo.txt') as the problem.
EB: The zip file should be able to successfully store files with the same name under different directories without encountering any problems during the export process.
SR: 1. Open the 'Export' dialog window. 2. Select both projects that were created earlier. 3. Give the zip file a name (such as 'test.zip'). 4. Click 'Export to zip file' and ensure that the export process completes without any error messages.
